item.title: Deploying the Site
item.description: Currently the deployment is a bit of a manual process. We’re utilizing Elixir Releases inside of a docker container for dependency management and portability. No state is stored on the host machine besides a couple of environment variables. How to Deploy git pull docker-compose build docker-compose down && docker-compose up -d
